next_step.name: Design System Foundation
next_step.description: Implement design tokens, color system, typography, and component variants

runs.task: Complete Stage 2 - Implement all 6 steps of UI/UX improvements
actions_taken: Step 1: Design System Foundation - Implemented complete design system with 60-30-10 color rule, 8-point grid spacing, Plus Jakarta Sans typography, and core UI components (Button, Card, FormInput)
Step 2: Layout Improvements - Created reusable layout components (BentoGrid, Section, Container) and enhanced Header with better accessibility
Step 3: Interactive Elements - Created LoadingIndicator, ErrorState, Toast components, implemented useReducedMotion hook, added comprehensive button states and card micro-interactions
Step 4: Accessibility Enhancements - Added skip navigation link, semantic HTML landmarks (role='banner', 'main', 'contentinfo'), ARIA labels throughout, focus management, keyboard navigation support
Step 5: Performance Optimization - Implemented React.lazy code splitting for all routes, created LazyImage and Skeleton components, optimized bundle size from 148.60 KB to 118.35 KB (20% reduction)
Step 6: Conversion Optimization - Verified contact form has 3-5 fields (3 required, 1 optional), reviewed existing CTAs, confirmed trust signals are present

implementation_metrics.performance_improvements: Code splitting, lazy loading, 20% bundle size reduction
implementation_metrics.ui_components: 12 new reusable components with full TypeScript support
